title: Formula Type Conversion
description: Map the value of a formula field type to other field types for use in automation processes.
targetFileds: Currently supported target field types include: Date, Number, Text, Email, Rating, Currency. Continuously updating ~
funcPlaceholder: Please select the formula type field to be mapped
otherPlaceholder: Please select the target type field to map to
targetFieldSelectTip: Please check the target field type to map to
convertModeInfo: If not selected, it will be applied to all records in the table by default
